entry.title: Two Faces of the Same Coin
entry.summary:
Author: CryptidButterfly

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,090Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Both Clark and Bruce don't know each other's secret identities, and neither know they are cheating with each other... with each other. However after a difficult battle Clark decides to confess- only to reveal the truth.
